coolSymbols.title: Cool Symbols
coolSymbols.description: Cool symbols are unique characters and icons that enhance visual interest and express emotions or ideas using unique symbols. They are widely used across social media, messaging apps, and websites to make content more engaging.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Tap on any symbol to see its details, then tap

usage.title: Using Cool Symbols
usage.description: Incorporating cool symbols into your digital content can make it more appealing and convey messages more effectively. Here are some tips:

copyPaste.title: Copy and Paste
copyPaste.description: Many websites and apps allow you to copy symbols directly and paste them into your content.

keyboard_shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard_shortcuts.description: Some symbols can be inserted using keyboard shortcuts.

examples.mac: Use the Option key with other keys

character_map_tools.title: Character Map Tools
character_map_tools.description: Operating systems often include character map utilities that let you select and insert special characters.

compatibility.title: Compatibility
compatibility.description: Ensure that the symbols you use are supported across different devices and platforms.

readability.title: Readability
readability.description: Use symbols sparingly to avoid clutter and ensure clarity.

cultural_differences.title: Cultural Differences
cultural_differences.description: Some symbols may have different meanings in different cultures.
